filter_tags: Tags by which modules are filtered
server_pw: Password to the script running on the module server
ignore_str: String which is searched for to mark a module as ignored
confirm_delete: Toggles confirmation prompt before deleting a module
show_requests: Show traffic sent and recieved from the module server
autoupdate_modules: Automatically updates all modules at the start of the program
autoupdate_script: Automatically updates the script upon startup
reconnect_timeout: The amount of seconds the script waits before attempting to reconnect to the server
request_waittime: The amount of seconds the script waits before marking a request as 'timed out'
striped_rows: Whether the rows are in alternating colours or not. Helps to visually seperate them.
